abstract: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia agrees to release child soldiers as part of ongoing peace negotiations with Colombian government; crucial step in resolution of country's civil war leaves problem of reintegrating former combatants into society.

headline.print_headline: Colombian Rebels Agree to Release Child Soldiers
headline.main: Colombia and FARC Rebels Reach a Deal to Free Child Soldiers

snippet: The government and the rebel group known as FARC said on Sunday that they had an agreement that could involve hundreds of children.
lead_paragraph: The government and the rebel group known as FARC said on Sunday that they had an agreement that could involve hundreds of children.
